title: eJay Dance 5 v5.07.0039-CHAOS [deepstatus]
description:
eJay Dance 5 v5.07.0039










Dance 5 heralds a new dimension in music creation thanks to its incredible new interface and the first-ever 3D engine used in this sector, plus a whole host of brand new features.

At the same time Dance 5 remains easy to use. Let your musical creativity flow with an astonishing 5,000 brand new royalty-free dance samples to choose from. Trance, techno, house and dance Ã¢â‚¬â€œ youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find the whole dance music spectrum covered!

Dance eJay 5 not only offers the user the classic heritage of the infamous Ã¢â‚¬ËœDanceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ series but also boasts great new instruments: enter a new dimension of music creation with the reworked Hyper Generator 5 (a polyphonic synthesizer), the Groove Generator (a drum computer for programming your own drum loops), not forgetting the brand new Chord Generator and Bass Generator for creating yet more cutting-edge dance sounds! Last but not least, prepare to be amazed by the brand new 3D VJ Box! Here you can arrange your own visuals to go with your mix, selecting from over 1000 3D objects.



Let your musical creativity flow with an astonishing 5,000 brand new royalty-free dance samples to choose from.

5,000 royalty-free and brand new dance samples

Stylish 48-track sound mixer in CD Quality

New Time & Tune Generator

New Chord Generator

New Bass Generator

New 3D VJ Box

New polyphonic Hyper Generator

Groove Generator


_______________________________________________________________________________________________


   System Requirements

Windows 7/Vista/XP, DirectX 8.1, 1,5 GHz processor, 512 MB Memory, 680 MB Hard Disk Space






[Installation]

UnRar.

Install ejay_dance_5_setup.
( choose proper lang in setup window )

Don't launch yet.

Copy the content from Patch folder to installation directory

x64: C:Program Files (x86)eJayDance 5
x86: C:Program FileseJayDance 5
